alert.note: Alert for Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 1:46AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New Castle, northwestern Kent, northeastern Queen Anne`s, northeastern Kent, western Salem, south central Chester and southwestern Delaware Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 146 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pleasant Hill to Crumpton. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Dover, Newark, Middletown, Pennsville, Smyrna, Carneys Point, Elsmere, New Castle, Penns Grove, Salem, Clayton, Delaware City, Cheswold, Newport, Millington, Sudlersville, Arden, Stanton and Glasgow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 23. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
